name: Mussar and Mindful Living -- Boston's First Mussar Conference
content: Featuring Alan Morinis, author of Everyday Holiness and more, Rabbi David Jaffe, author of Changing the World from the Inside Out, Rabbi Marcia Plumb, and experienced Mussar teachers. Whether you are new to Mussar or experienced, everyone will learn more about how to strengthen our souls, find tools for inner calm and managing life's stresses. Mussar is a medieval Jewish methodology using text study and spiritual practices to live more holy, centered lives. Enjoy a keynote talk by Alan Morinis, and a variety of sessions throughout the day including Yoga Mussar, Mussar for use in psychotherapy, Mussar 101, a teen track, Advanced Mussar, a special teen track with Mussar being explored with Hip Hop and more.
